content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":24830,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0aa3cb84-1144-437e-8960-76891f712449/QE_onboarding_9.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0aa3cb84-1144-437e-8960-76891f712449/QE_onboarding_9.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-left\",\"fileName\":\"QE_onboarding_9.png\",\"name\":\"QE_onboarding_9.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0aa3cb84-1144-437e-8960-76891f712449\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":546,\"height\":160},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Functional testing is one of the key testing disciplines, its goal is to check and test the compliance of the developed software with the original functional requirements of the client. That is, carrying out functional testing allows you to check if an information system is able to solve tasks that users need under certain conditions. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Like every discipline, testing has basic knowledge and activities that a tester encounters every day and almost on every project. We are talking about the testing process, and about testing types and levels, working with documentation (requirements, test cases, checklists, test plans, test strategy, bug report, report of test results), estimates, metrics, methodology, and more.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Even though testing is called manual, it does not mean it’s simple. Often, to test the functionality, it is necessary to check not only the UI, but also what is behind it. It includes back-end testing, web services, APIs, databases, data migration, mobile testing with all the necessary checks and specifics. To develop as a functional tester, it is worth starting with basic knowledge for every tester. It is ideal to know and have an idea of different technical areas and eventually dive deeper and deeper.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One can try themselves in mobile testing, accessibility, mix functional testing with automation, business analysis, or even completely switch to automation or development. Senior and higher-level engineers may take managerial tasks (work with processes, testing strategy or with a team), still engineering tasks will remain, even for leads and managers. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Even though now there is a trend for universal specialists who can perform a wide range of tasks, the main thing is perfect knowledge of basics that allows one to grow in any chosen technical direction. It is worth striving to have technical knowledge and automation skills at least at the launch-analysis level. And also, do not forget that behind the UI there is always a back-end, a database.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"While mobile testing and test automation are the trend as well as other more technical\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\",\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" disciplines, functional testing, in any case, remains the basis and foundation.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can learn more\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" about development in functional testing by studying the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMASMT/Testing+Discipline\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"skills matrix\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", as well as mentoring programs for different levels: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=7a3f049d-fdae-4fee-8bdf-3db51b228e61\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"basic\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=1689c7ec-d63a-4a8b-b9ca-6fc98d22b2ee\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"advanced\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
